data.meta_description: Kansas City University: Leader in osteopathic medicine, health sciences, and innovation.
data.text:
When we say "Welcome," we mean it

The KCU student community is routinely cited as one of the most welcoming of its kind—and it shows. The relationships you make with your peers will make you a better student in and outside of the classroom—and provide you with a professional network for life.

See where 100 years of momentum will take you

Kansas City, Missouri, has been home to KCU for over 100 years. Throughout our history, we’ve built strong community ties, particularly in our historic northeast neighborhood. Now, KCU is proud to call Joplin, Missouri, a second home.

Preparing you to answer the call

Your dream may be to make a difference in the life sciences as a physician, psychologist, dentist, researcher or scientist. Our drive is to help you realize that dream by providing the highest quality educational programs that prepare you to meet the heath care needs of the future. At KCU, we want to prepare you to answer your call with every tool and skill you can possibly fit into four years.
